Ah, so you wish to bestow a special ability onto your weapon! Good idea. Enchantment? No worries. Bestowing a special ability won't make the enchantment disappear. We can equip Runes to any weapons with sockets.
Choose the Runes you wish to equip to your weapons!

If you have too many Runes that you don't want, I can also change them to another type. Though I can't choose the type of Rune that it will be.
You should test out your luck. That's how life is...
